name: Pressure on The Rope
description:
Pressure On The Rope

This game depicts the psychological strain a student has to go through against the corrupted system and the decision they make, I tried to paint this game in a manner to keep ourselves on the same page as they were.

*Warning contains visual and jumpscare*

Note: 1.Due do my final year examination i would be able to complete the game after a few week's.

2. Donate if you can, it'll stop my computer from lagging when adding post processing.

Controls:

WASD - for movement

E - interact with items

Esc - pause the game
